titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that certain welfare programs discourage marriage and hurt the institution of the family in the United States.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that certain welfare programs discourage marriage and hurt the institution of the family in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for review of any government programs or policies that financially penalize married couples as opposed to unmarried individuals.
